mapper.select: SELECT place.place_no AS no, title, category, gu_address, after_gu_address, detail_address, x, y, star, place.user_id, content, written_date, pet_type FROM place LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AVG(star) AS star, place_no FROM reply GROUP BY place_no ) AS r ON place.place_no = r.place_no WHERE place.place_no = #{no}
